instruction: Describe the user's current feelings in one phrase.
input: Angry at the longest waiting time ever
output: Fuming frustration

instruction: Connect the two pieces of text with a logical transition.
input:
The choice was easy; he was never going back.
He had been through too much.
output: The choice was easy; he had been through too much and was never going back.

instruction: Generate a sentence that conveys excitement
output: I'm so excited for what the future holds!

instruction: Classify the oldest members of a historic attraction.
output: The oldest members of Westminster Abbey are the tombs and monuments, many of which date back to medieval times.

instruction: Generate a theory of why a given phenomenon happens.
output: A lunar eclipse occurs when the Earth passes directly between the Sun and the Moon, casting a shadow on the Moon and temporarily blocking the Sun's light from reaching the Moon's surface. This happens because the Earth's orbit is slightly tilted from the Sun's orbit, allowing the three celestial bodies to align in a straight line. The Moon's orbit around the Earth is slightly elliptical and its orbit shifts, resulting in either a partial lunar eclipse or a total lunar eclipse.

instruction: Suggest a product to a customer.
input: A customer is looking for a phone for video calling.
output: I would recommend the Apple iPhone 12, which has a 12MP front-facing camera with 1080p HD video recording and supports FaceTime video calling.

instruction: Come up with a fictional movie title.
output: The Invisible Traveler

instruction: Describe the different types of professional opportunities available in a given industry.
output: The graphic design industry offers a variety of professional opportunities, such as graphic designers, concept designers, layout designers, production designers, and multimedia designers. Graphic designers create visuals to communicate messages, such as logos, infographics, posters, and web designs. Concept designers are responsible for showing an idea through design, form, and function. Layout designers create page layouts and work with typography, images, and diagrams. Production designers specialize in preparation for printing, such as making sure all elements are sized properly in a file. Finally, multimedia designers combine audio, visual, and text elements to create engaging experiences on websites, mobile platforms, and other digital mediums.

instruction: Describe the features of a given type of vehicle.
output: SUVs have the capability of handling off-road terrain, larger cargo capacity than sedans, higher ground clearance and a higher seating position for greater visibility of the road. They generally have a powerful engine, four-wheel drive, improved suspension and available roof racks or a trailer hitch. Most SUVs also include other modern features such as power windows, automatic transmission, and air conditioning.

instruction: Generate a list of topics to include in a given document.
input: A guide to creating a business plan
output: A business plan guide should include topics such as setting and achieving goals, understanding the market and target audience, researching and analyzing competitors, creating and tracking financial models, writing a business plan executive summary, and determining appropriate financing options.

instruction: Name an animal found in a given habitat.
output: Animals commonly found in rivers include fish, turtles, beavers, muskrats, and otters.

instruction: List technologies adopted by a given company to stay ahead of competition.
output: Google has adopted various technologies to stay ahead of the competition. These include cloud computing through Google Cloud, big data analytics with Google BigQuery, artificial intelligence and machine learning with Google AI, and mobile development via Google Play.

instruction: Describe a time when you made an impact at work.
input: I was working on a project involving the implementation of a new database system.
output: During the development phase of the project, I was able to identify some issues with how the data was being stored. Through my due diligence and attention to detail, I was able to create a more efficient database system which improved the speed of the queries, resulting in a reduction of computational time. As a result, our team was able to complete the project ahead of schedule.

instruction: Evaluate the following movie review.
input: This movie was truly inspiring and had wonderful characters.
output: Positive review.

instruction: Give a reason why robots should not be trusted to make decision in the home.
output: Robots lack the capacity to understand human emotions and needs. Therefore, they may make decisions that do not have the best interests of the family in mind or could lead to unintended consequences.

instruction: Name two features of a reliable e-commerce website
output: A reliable e-commerce website should have secure payment options and accurate product descriptions.

instruction: Describe how one might go about creating a customer satisfaction survey.
output: To create a customer satisfaction survey, begin by identifying the goals of the survey. Then, decide on the format and structure of the survey, such as its length, the types of questions to be asked, and the channels through which it will be conducted. Finally, implement the survey and promptly respond to customer feedback.

instruction: Compose a brief advertisement for a new technology product
output: Introducing the latest in tech: the XYZ 1000! With its revolutionary design and advanced features, the XYZ 1000 is the perfect tool for any job. Get yours today and increase your efficiency and productivity.

instruction: Identify key elements of a successful marketing campaign
output: A successful marketing campaign should have clear goals, an appropriate target audience, an effective message, use of multiple channels, and good timing.

instruction: Generate a list of 5 ideas for the title of a book
output:
